Jargon Term: large amount of fluid around your heart
You underwent a pericardiocentesis with drainage of the fluid and your symptoms improved dramatically
we are giving you medications to prevent the fluid from re-accumulating
START Ibuprofen 200mg tabs 3 tabs by mouth as needed for pain (Please do not take more than 2400 grams daily, you can take less if you feel it is enough for your pain)
START Colchicine 0.6mg by mouth twice daily (You will take this medication for at least 6 months to prevent the fluid around your heart from coming back)
